summary: "Spider-Man: Far From Home," a 2019 superhero movie, is about Peter Parker (Spider-Man) battling the Elementals while on a school trip to Europe. Directed by Jon Watts and starring Tom Holland, Samuel L. Jackson, and Jake Gyllenhaal, it's the sequel to "Spider-Man: Homecoming." Discussions started in 2016, and filming took place in 2018 across Europe and New York. The film premiered in June 2019 and made over $1.1 billion worldwide, becoming the highest-grossing Spider-Man film and Sony's most successful movie. It was praised for its humor, action, and visuals. A follow-up, "Spider-Man: No Way Home," was released in 2021.
title: Spider-Man Far From Home
